> Dataset page: [TidyTuesday: Premier League Match Data](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/tree/main/data/2023/2023-04-04)  
> Original source: [Premier League (from Evan Gower on Kaggle)](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/evangower/premier-league-match-data)

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytuesdayR)

soccer <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/main/data/2023/2023-04-04/soccer21-22.csv')

team_goals <- soccer |>
  group_by(HomeTeam) |>
  summarise(avg_goals = mean(FTHG, na.rm = TRUE))

ggplot(team_goals, aes(x = HomeTeam, y = avg_goals)) +
  geom_col(fill = "blue") +
  labs(
    title = "Average Home Goals per Match by Team (2021–22)",
    x = "Team",
    y = "Average Goals",
    caption = "Source: TidyTuesday 2023-04-04, Premier League 2021–22"
  ) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))


```
